TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizerRankOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Request a set of actions to be ranked by the Personalizer service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RankRequest class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.AI.Personalizer.PersonalizerRankableAction> actions) cil managed
Public Sub New (actions As IEnumerable(Of PersonalizerRankableAction))

Docs.param: The set of actions the Personalizer service can pick from. The set should not contain more than 50 actions. The order of the actions does not affect the rank result but the order should match the sequence your application would have used to display them. The first item in the array will be used as Baseline item in Offline Evaluations.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of PersonalizerRankOptions.

MemberSignature.Value: public PersonalizerRankOptions (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.AI.Personalizer.PersonalizerRankableAction> actions, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<object> contextFeatures = default, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> excludedActions = default, string eventId = default, bool? deferActivation = default);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.AI.Personalizer.PersonalizerRankableAction> actions, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<object> contextFeatures, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> excludedActions, string eventId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> deferActivation) cil managed

Public Sub New (actions As IEnumerable(Of PersonalizerRankableAction), Optional contextFeatures As IEnumerable(Of Object) = Nothing, Optional excludedActions As IEnumerable(Of String) = Nothing, Optional eventId As String = Nothing, Optional deferActivation As Nullable(Of Boolean) = Nothing)

Docs.param: The set of actions the Personalizer service can pick from. The set should not contain more than 50 actions. The order of the actions does not affect the rank result but the order should match the sequence your application would have used to display them. The first item in the array will be used as Baseline item in Offline evaluations.

Features of the context used for Personalizer as a dictionary of dictionaries. This depends on the application, and typically includes features about the current user, their device, profile information, aggregated data about time and date, etc. Features should not include personally identifiable information (PII), unique UserIDs, or precise timestamps. Need to be JSON serializable. https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/personalizer/concepts-features.
The set of action ids to exclude from ranking.

Optionally pass an eventId that uniquely identifies this Rank event. If null, the service generates a unique eventId. The eventId will be used for associating this request with its reward, as well as seeding the pseudo-random generator when making a Personalizer call.

Send false if it is certain the rewardActionId in rank results will be shown to the user, therefore Personalizer will expect a Reward call, otherwise it will assign the default Reward to the event. Send true if it is possible the user will not see the action specified in the rank results, because the page is rendering later, or the Rank results may be overridden by code further downstream.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RankRequest class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Actions As IEnumerable(Of PersonalizerRankableAction)

Docs.summary: The set of actions the Personalizer service can pick from. The set should not contain more than 50 actions. The order of the actions does not affect the rank result but the order should match the sequence your application would have used to display them. The first item in the array will be used as Baseline item in Offline Evaluations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContextFeatures As IEnumerable(Of Object)

Docs.summary: Features of the context used for Personalizer as a dictionary of dictionaries. This is determined by your application, and typically includes features about the current user, their device, profile information, aggregated data about time and date, etc. Features should not include personally identifiable information (PII), unique UserIDs, or precise timestamps. Need to be JSON serializable. https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/personalizer/concepts-features.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DeferActivation As Nullable(Of Boolean)
member this.DeferActivation : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Send false if it is certain the rewardActionId in rank results will be shown to the user, therefore Personalizer will expect a Reward call, otherwise it will assign the default Reward to the event. Send true if it is possible the user will not see the action specified in the rank results, (e.g. because the page is rendering later, or the Rank results may be overridden by code further downstream). You must call the Activate Event API if the event output is shown to users, otherwise Rewards will be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EventId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Optionally pass an eventId that uniquely identifies this Rank event. If null, the service generates a unique eventId. The eventId will be used for associating this request with its reward, as well as seeding the pseudo-random generator when making a Personalizer call.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExcludedActions As IEnumerable(Of String)

Docs.summary: The set of action ids to exclude from ranking. Personalizer will consider the first non-excluded item in the array as the Baseline action when performing Offline Evaluations.
